forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers this evening. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers this evening. Breaks in the overcast later. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 27F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snowfall around one inch.
